snippet: The area south of San Francisco is the least-celebrated great American region for cabernet sauvignon.
abstract: Eric Asimov The Pour column submits Santa Cruz Mountains area of California produces some of America's best cabernet sauvignon wines, yet region, which produces only small amount of wine, goes largely unrecognized.
lead_paragraph: The area south of San Francisco is the least-celebrated great American region for cabernet sauvignon.

headline.print_headline: The California Cabernets You Never Knew
headline.main: Santa Cruz Cabernet: Wines You Never Knew
